main event: A UFO sighting reported as a ball of fire observed in Dayton, Ohio on June 10, 1956.
interesting points: The object was observed moving south at approximately 2155 EST,The sighting was reported by an 11-year-old boy,Concerns arose that the object might have been an outdoor flare,Military flight service could not confirm the object's identity,The report concluded that insufficient data was available for evaluation.
